A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Wait\, is this is the wrong movie. I'm looking for the "SJW Wars".......... Huge Star Wars fan but this is movie was absolute garbage. It completely destroyed the legacy left by George Lucas. The six movies made by Lucas are rendered irrelevant by the Last Jedi. The lore has been shattered. At times I thought I was seeing a Mel Brooks spoof "Feminists in Space". Every male character is an idiot. Every female character is wonder woman. The leftist agenda is strong in disney star wars. And besides all those pleasant elements\, the plot is garbage\, there is no story And all intrigue has been eliminated.
They turned Luke Skywalker into a joke who behaved out of character. It would have been more dignified to make him a cuckhold husband to one of these feminists characters in the Rebellion. And they didn't even have the decency to give Leia a dignified death.  I guess they figured keeping her alive is a good way of selling tickets for the next one.  How low can you get? 

I realized Disney never had any intention of adding to the story of Star Wars.  They are remaking the original films and they used Harrison Ford\, Mark Hamill\, and Carrie Fisher to sell tickets for this atrocity of trilogy.    THis fact is very disappointing.  Movies with great stories could have been created. 

 I have no interest in the remaining characters. I don't care what happens in episode 9. For all I care both sides can blow one another up. Please do and then sell the franchise back to George Lucas so he can redo this trilogy. I won't be watching any\,ore disney star wars\, or rather sjw wars.
